title: New iridium catalyst enables efficient selective synthesis of valuable drug ingredients

title_detail.value: New iridium catalyst enables efficient selective synthesis of valuable drug ingredients

summary: The researchers found that transient formation of hydrogen bonding between a substrate and the catalyst induced such high segregation in the reaction. By using inexpensive and readily available feedstock hydrocarbons, the researchers produced a group of chiral lactams in different shapes. Their diverse structures allow lactams to correspond to different pharmaceutical drugs.
